name: Conway's Game of Life (Zac E)
description:
Conway's Game of Life made in Godot.
Click to create patterns of alive and dead cells and watch as they move in interesting ways.

Keyboard Shortcuts for the onscreen buttons:

  • Play/Pause: space
  • Screen Clear: backspace/delete
  • Step Forward: enter
  • Speed Up: D/right arrow
  • Slow Down: A/left arrow
